publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1749 Mr Andy Kerr: The Draft Freedom of Information (Fees for Required Disclosure) (Scotland) Regulations 2004—That the Justice 1 Committee recommends that the draft Freedom of Information (Fees for Required Disclosure) (Scotland) Regulations 2004 be approved. Supported by: Tavish Scott*

S2M-1749 Mr Andy Kerr: The Draft Freedom of Information (Fees for Required Disclosure) (Scotland) Regulations 2004—That the Justice 1 Committee recommends that the draft Freedom of Information (Fees for Required Disclosure) (Scotland) Regulations 2004 be approved. Supported by: Tavish Scott
